Headline: Temporary Southbound #147 Outer Drive Express Reroute near Howard Red Line
ShortDescription: Southbound #147 Outer Drive Express buses are temporarily rerouted near Howard Red Line.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #147 Outer Drive Express  buses are temporarily rerouted via Howard, Clark, Touhy, Sheridan, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Howard Red Line.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at UIC-Halsted due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at UIC-Halsted due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
